byline.contributor: Yana Paskova and Noah Remnick contributed reporting.

abstract: New York City police announce arrest of Bronx man Jose Feliciano on murder charges due to his involvement in death of his 2-month-old son Mason Whyte in early December; arrest was prompted by remarks made by mother Danielle Whyte to employee at hospital, where she was taken after attempting suicide.
lead_paragraph: Jose Feliciano, 51, has been charged with murder in the death of his 2-month-old son, whose body was found in a wooded area in Dutchess County, the police said.

headline.main: Police Say Bronx Father Choked Baby and Disposed of Body Upstate
headline.print_headline: Father Accused of Killing Baby and Dumping Body Upstate

snippet: Jose Feliciano, 51, has been charged with murder in the death of his 2-month-old son, whose body was found in a wooded area in Dutchess County, the police said.
